name: Hyperballoid HD
description:
Welcome to the future! Hyperballoid HD is a next-gen Arkanoid game that features two visually stunning game worlds complete with animated levels and realistic physics.

As you shatter these elaborate creations, you'll enjoy using outrageous new power-ups and marvel at the game's smooth controls. As you break apart these complex creations, you'll enjoy using outrageous new power-ups and will be surprised by the game's smooth controls. Amazing art and animation, along with a bass-heavy techno soundtrack, will immerse you in the psychedelic world of Hyperballoid HD!



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
